notesStmt.note: A translation, by Christopher Fetherstone, of: Constant, Léonard. "Remonstrance chrestienne et salutaire", Geneva, 1586. The author's name is ambiguously mentioned by an exhortatory poem on A6r, line 2 from bottom, referring to the path 'Which constant hath proposde to you.'--Cf. STC.
Running title reads: An admonition to the Frenchmen.
